## Pull Request Template

### Summary of Changes
- Brief description of what was implemented/changed
- Reference to related issue(s) if applicable

### Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Breaking change
- [ ] Refactoring
- [ ] Documentation update

### Testing
- [ ] Unit tests added/updated
- [ ] Integration tests added/updated
- [ ] Manual testing performed
- [ ] E2E tests added/updated

### Code Review Checklist

#### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows established style guides and conventions
- [ ] Proper error handling and logging implemented
- [ ] Code is well-documented with appropriate comments
- [ ] No commented-out code or debug statements
- [ ] Code is modular and follows SRP (Single Responsibility Principle)

#### Performance
- [ ] No performance regressions introduced
- [ ] Animations complete within 100ms as required
- [ ] Efficient algorithms and data structures used
- [ ] Proper loading states implemented for async operations

#### Accessibility (WCAG 2.1 AA)
- [ ] All UI components meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards
- [ ] Proper ARIA attributes implemented where needed
- [ ] Sufficient color contrast (4.5:1 for normal text)
- [ ] Keyboard navigation works properly
- [ ] Focus management implemented correctly
- [ ] Reduced motion preferences respected

#### Security
- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] Proper input validation implemented
- [ ] No sensitive information exposed

#### Compatibility
- [ ] Works across all required browsers
- [ ] Responsive design works on all required screen sizes
- [ ] Theme switching works properly (light/dark mode)

#### Functionality
- [ ] All new functionality works as specified
- [ ] Existing functionality not broken
- [ ] Form validation works as expected (real-time validation)
- [ ] All user stories implemented correctly

#### Code Structure
- [ ] Proper separation of concerns
- [ ] State management implemented correctly
- [ ] Components are reusable where appropriate
- [ ] No unnecessary dependencies added

#### Testing Coverage
- [ ] Test coverage is 95%+ as required
- [ ] Edge cases handled appropriately
- [ ] Error states handled properly

### Screenshots (if applicable)
- Add screenshots demonstrating the changes

### Additional Notes
- Any additional information reviewers should know
